jīreti：[caus．of jīrati] causes to decay or digest．

Jīreti，& Jīrāpeti [Verbal formation from jīra1] to work out，to digest J．I，238，274 （jīreti）； DhA．I，171．Appl．to bhati，wages：bhatiṁ ajīrāpetva not working off the w．J．II，309，381； jīrāpeti as “destroy” at ThA．269 in expln of nijjareti （+vināseti）．（Page 284）
jīreti：ဇီရေတိ ဇီရယတိ
